ValidationRule.description: Checks the values selected in the identify stage for IPU opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ="International_Projects_Unit", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Identify"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Assessment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discontinued")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to the next stage which is Assessment or mark the Opportunity as Discontinued
